groups.ogone:
Ogone


Signing up with Ogone

Please enter the correct post back url and offline processiong url in Ogone configuration

post back url example: http://myMagentoStore.com/ogone/api/postBack

offline processing url example: http://myMagentoStore.com/ogone/api/offlineProcess

text 800 1 1 1 Enabled select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 5 1 1 0 Debug select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 10 1 1 0 Title text 15 1 1 1 PSPID text PSPID is a case sensitive field. 20 1 1 0 SHA-IN Pass Phrase Use in posting data from Magento to Ogone.
Use in data checking by Ogone before the payment. adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted obscure 25 1 1 0 SHA-OUT Pass Phrase Use in posting data from Ogone to Magento.
Use in feedback data checking by Magento. adminhtml/system_config_backend_encrypted obscure 30 1 1 0 Hash All Parameters Enabling this feature needs adjusting "Technical information > Global security parameters" on merchant administration. To hash all parameters, select the following options in the "Global security parameters" fieldset:
  • Each parameter followed by the pass phrase.
  • "Hash algorithm" same as "Hashing Algorithm" below
